loc.EN:
The 4.38×30mm Libra (.17 Libra) is a centerfire cartridge designed for use in personal defense weapons. It was designed and has been manufactured by ČZW for use in their ČZW-438. The cartridge is based on a .22 Hornet cartridge converted to a rimless design and necked down to .17 calibre. The .17 Libra has been standardized by C.I.P. to a pressure of 4300 bar.
Variants
.17 Libra [4.38×30mm]: A rimless varmint hunting and sport-shooting cartridge. .17 Rimmed Libra [4.38×30mmR]: A rimmed varmint-hunting and sport-shooting cartridge for use with break-open actions. .17 Libra Magnum [4.38×??mm]: A longer, more powerful rimless round for use in pistols or Personal Defense Weapons.
(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/4.38%C3%9730mm_Libra)
